name: KDevendra Co
overview:
Over the last 15 years, K Devendra And Co. has successfully achieved a distinct position in the market of manufacturing, supplying, wholesaling and exporting 100% Cotton Men’s Casual Shirts. All our shirts are made from the finest grade mill made fabric, sourced from promising vendors of the market. Designed and developed as per the changing fashion trends, our shirts have received huge appreciation for the wide product range, quality stitching and competitive pricing.

Products Range: Half Sleeve Shirts Full Sleeve Shirts Single Pocket Shirts 2 Pocket Shirts Cargo Shirts Twill Shirts Poplin Shirts

Our Team: Skilled Craftsmen Textile Experts Tailors Quality Analyst Production Managers Sales and Marketing Executives Other Associates

Our Infrastructure: Our organization is spread over a huge landmass and equipped with all requisite amenities. Systematically constructed with modern architecture, the unit is comprised of 8 factories, which are laced with advanced sewing machines and other requisite equipment.

Quality Assurance: In this competitive market, we have carved a niche for ourselves by focusing on offering the finest quality products to our clients. We ensure that our complete range of 100% cotton men’s casual shirts are manufactured using the best grade mill made fabric in Twill, Sateen and Poplin which are sourced from renowned vendors of the nation.

Client satisfaction: Ever since our inception, the main objective of our organization is to attain utmost satisfaction of the clients and establish strong rapport with them. Keeping in mind the same, the entire range that we offer is specifically created using premium grade 100% cotton mill made fabrics and other material in strict compliance with international quality standards.
